attributes.action: Put Jeffrey Archer On Minimum Wage Or The Dole
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jeffrey Archer is a greedy man who thinks that £62k a year is a struggle to live on. There are people in our country who live on as little as circa £50 a week, totalling a mere £2,400 (roughly) a year. This is what I call a struggle. Give JA a taste of his own medicine and stop him being greedy.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
